title: Question:
author: Mst.Wangdan$
content: Two days ago today I had $100 I traded $100 in bitcoin and made $10 profit now I traded $110 in bitcoin now I have $180 I mean I made $70 in two days Best earnings of my life And I want to make bigger profits trading bitcoin in the future and I want to light my future by trading bitcoin and I will trade and I will not train too much by greed I will not be addicted to training I will always watch the market and invest on bitcoin will try it looks great to me i started with $100 now i have bitcoins $180 i earned $80  between the two it is never possible by any job and it is not possible by any government government what is possible with bitcoin i am bitcoin Much respect and salute. I have seen here many people comparing gambling game with bitcoin gambling game is a test of luck a game should never be compared to it and if you have experience on gambling then you can play gambling but you can't get addicted and get addicted to anything. It is neither good nor harmful for a person.

comments.author: Odohu
comments.body: I think this topic would have been better in Trading discussion.... Nevertheless,  trading can be a very profitable venture if the skill set is mastered.  So, if you are able to develop a winning strategy, keep it up and ensure you are consistent.  Follow your rules and good luck.

comments.author: Orpichukwu
comments.body: Congratulations on your trade success! It's not easy to increase one's portfolio in this crypto space, and doing this means you are a pro in the trade industry.A trade history for such successful transactions with profit will be much appreciated. I'm just finding it so hard to believe the story entirely since there have been a lot of cooked-up stories here on the forum by merit fishers. To clear the doubt, we should at least see a screenshot or something that some members might ask for in a wallet and sign in a message, but that might be a little difficult since your trade should be conducted in an exchange.

comments.author: Mst.Wangdan$
comments.body: Quote from: Orpichukwu on September 25, 2023, 06:11:46 PMCongratulations on your trade success! It's not easy to increase one's portfolio in this crypto space, and doing this means you are a pro in the trade industry.A trade history for such successful transactions with profit will be much appreciated. I'm just finding it so hard to believe the story entirely since there have been a lot of cooked-up stories here on the forum by merit fishers. To clear the doubt, we should at least see a screenshot or something that some members might ask for in a wallet and sign in a message, but that might be a little difficult since your trade should be conducted in an exchange.I realize I should have put it here with a picture but I'm a new account owner and putting my picture here won't support it and if a person does more research on something then he must be brilliant on that thing and that's what I do. I want to know and learn more about this subject because I am researching it and I am sharing it with you and through me the next generation can learn.

comments.author: Ojima-ojo
comments.created_time: September 25, 2023, 06:26:39 PMLast edit: September 29, 2023, 05:15:44 PM by Ojima-ojo
comments.body: This thread is somehow confusing and depressing at the same time, I can say that the ops have a lot of things to learn, and since this is his first profit, I don't blame his excitement and announcing it here, but afterwards, he dived into gambling and mentioned quite a lot of things even mentioning addictions in the write-ups.My only advice for the io right now is for him to take things easy with trading because just as you earn profits in trading, you will also record losses too, so you have to trade with only an amount you can bear with if you lose them.

comments.author: Upgrade00
comments.body: Bitcoin hasn't quite changed your life yet, you just discovered trading and how it works. Trading is not a steady source of income, even the best of traders have good and bad days in which they make profits or incur losses.Keep learning and never risk more than you can afford to lose.Quote from: Mst.Wangdan$ on September 25, 2023, 06:18:42 PMI realize I should have put it here with a picture but I'm a new account owner and putting my picture here won't support itYou do not have to. Pictures can be easily edited and does not prove anything.If you do have a real reason to post a picture and cannot wait to earn a few more activities, you can purchase a copper membership.

comments.author: Sophokles
comments.body: Quote from: Mst.Wangdan$ on September 23, 2023, 03:54:46 PMI learned something new today. I started bitcoin trading with 100 $ I made 10$ from here and I lost 11$ gambling with 100$ now I don't call gambling bad because I don't understand and I don't have patience to play the game and past I easily from bitcoin made 10$ profit now which one should i choose you say i know a man need bitcoins in future but still a man can be addicted to gambling and to all of you i want to say none of you should be addicted to anything and not to gambling and you are more Trade Bitcoin and see your future shine.Why you are creating the same topic twice!   Here is the previous one made by you. I learned something new from Bitcoin todayThis post is supposed to attract a merit source to pour some merit on it? Is there a fragment of reality in the story you have been sharing until now?

comments.author: Lanatsa
comments.body: Quote from: Mst.Wangdan$ on September 25, 2023, 05:58:01 PMTwo days ago today I had $100 I traded $100 in bitcoin and made $10 profit now I traded $110 in bitcoin now I have $180 I mean I made $70 in two days Best earnings of my life And I want to make bigger profits trading bitcoin in the future and I want to light my future by trading bitcoin and I will trade and I will not train too much by greed I will not be addicted to training I will always watch the market and invest on bitcoin will try it looks great to me i started with $100 now i have bitcoins $180 i earned $80  between the two it is never possible by any job and it is not possible by any government government what is possible with bitcoin i am bitcoin Much respect and salute. I have seen here many people comparing gambling game with bitcoin gambling game is a test of luck a game should never be compared to it and if you have experience on gambling then you can play gambling but you can't get addicted and get addicted to anything. It is neither good nor harmful for a person. Good for you if you do able to make $80 in just two days or something that 80% gain in 2 days isnt something that majority could really be able to do so or gain but doesnt mean that its impossible within this marketon which as long you do able to know on how to play with those moving prices then you could really be able to take advantage with the volatility and this is what makes interesting specially to those who do really knows on how to play with the volatility. Just bare in mind or just remember that making  yourself that confident would really be bad. Always stick with those risks management of yours and trying out to enhanceand make that capital to be bigger so that in later on then you could really make out some adjustments in every trading position or order you would be making on which if you do find yourselfthat already self sustaining then it could really be changing up your life forever.Just remember that this market is unpredictable and expect those unexpected things to happen along the way because not everyday this market looks good or fine.You would soon be able to encounter those movements which it isnt really that correlating neither with TA or FA.This is why you should be attentive and would really be that careful.

comments.author: Abu-Naim
comments.body: Quote from: Mst.Wangdan$ on September 25, 2023, 06:38:21 PMI'm involved with bitcoin now and I have a lot to learn I'm a small person and I've earned something so I'm very happy when I lose something I can be upset I can't be upset I have to turn around and support bitcoin  And I will do more and research about Bitcoin so that I will have more experience and I will be able to earn better profit by trading and I will keep getting Bitcoin updates from different places so that I don't fall into any wrong decision and I will never get addicted to gambling game. I don't want to be I will stay away from gambling that's why I have to fight many worlds in my life because now gambling is made in the world which is ruining the lives of many young society I want all young society to train on Bitcoin and make their future brightI completely get how you feel right now, mate. We usually feel good when we make a profit on any investment we make, and the same is true in bitcoin trading, where many lose money when they are unlucky or lack adequate background knowledge. I want you to understand that trading involves experience and in-depth information, and that luck is frequently a factor. I don't know how long you've been trading bitcoins, but I must say that you've been quite fortunate to earn in this market. Anyway, maintain studying and avoid being swayed by greed and emotions.

comments.author: Cantsay
comments.body: I’m not sure how we arrived at the gambling and gambling addiction part tho but it’s still a great thing to celebrate with you since you have made your first profit from trading bitcoin. I don’t know if this is your first trade ever or the first trade that you have ever made profit from since you’ve been trading but if the former is the case then I’d advice that you take your time to learn more about trading because most times beginners luck could kick in and then we’ll start having the mindset that we are now good at trading,,, don’t fall for that just take your time learn how to read and predict market trends that way you’ll be able to make more from trading. Quote from: Mst.Wangdan$ on September 25, 2023, 05:58:01 PMI will always watch the market and invest on bitcoin will try it looks great to me i started with $100 now i have bitcoins $180 i earned $80  between the two it is never possible by any job and it is not possible by any government government what is possible with bitcoin i am bitcoin Much respect and salute. I do understand your joy right now, and trust me if you invest more of your time to getting more knowledge you’ll make more than you have already made… Trading is really good only if you’re willing to learn and know how to do it yourself rather than to sit and wait for some self-proclaimed trading genius to send you signals.

comments.author: GeorgeJohn
comments.body: Quote from: Odohu on September 25, 2023, 06:11:04 PMI think this topic would have been better in Trading discussion.... Nevertheless,  trading can be a very profitable venture if the skill set is mastered.  So, if you are able to develop a winning strategy, keep it up and ensure you are consistent.  Follow your rules and good luck. I think you're right in this aspect of moving this trade directly to trading section instead of bitcoin here it's, what I really understand in the aspect of trading you can make your profit at any given point in time, so bitcoin trading is something I know very well that have to do with certain things, op saying bitcoin has changed his life I will that is sugar coating his composition so that people will have sympathy to him, check the total ratio of his profits is not up to one thousand dollars, so what op is saying is Hype of trading from my own perspective

comments.author: Egii Nna
comments.created_time: September 25, 2023, 10:03:19 PMLast edit: September 27, 2023, 07:42:22 AM by Egii Nna
comments.body: Op what I want you to understand that you should engage in read more about bitcoin because u can’t say that you will not train too much because if you didn’t have the knowledge mate you will end up losing all what you have worked for and mind you mate when investing make sure you invest what you can afford to lose because base on your thread you said you have invested all what you have which is $100 and know have a profit of $80 in just a short time of two days don’t be brainwashed mate think wisely and engage in research QuoteI have seen here many people comparing gambling game with bitcoin gambling game is a test of luck a game should never be compared to it and if you have experience on gambling then you can play gambling but you can't get addicted and get addicted to anything. It is neither good nor harmful for a person. And again, when creating a thread, make sure you focus on what you are saying because this is not a gambling section, so take note and also follow this link to get more information.Newbies read before posting

comments.author: Mpamaegbu
comments.body: Congratulations OP on your profit made, to start with. I can feel the excitement but don't get carried away and begin to think you've got the whole trading stuff all figured out. The market is in an uptrend at the moment and it's easy getting profit from it. The $80 in profit you made within a few days won't be enough for you to conclude Bitcoin has changed your life. I don't think that's enough profit, anyway. Don't think I'm a kill-joy. I'm just giving you heads on. By the way, this topic belongs in Trading Discussion, not here. Move it there or ask moderators to do so for you.

comments.author: BitDane
comments.body: Quote from: Ojima-ojo on September 25, 2023, 06:26:39 PMThis thread 8s somehow confusing and depressing at the same time, I can say that the ops have a lot of things to learn, and since this is his first profit, I don't blame his excitement and announcing it here, but afterwards, he dived into gambling and mentioned quite a lot of things even mentioning addictions in the write-ups.How can it be depressing when @OP is sharing one of the best earnings in his life? Are you jealous or something?  He did mention gambling but only to remind people that earnings in gambling is unpredictable worst people can be addicted to it and Bitcoin should not be compared to gambling.Actually, I find the post invigorating that fuels me to comeback to day trading.Quote from: Ojima-ojo on September 25, 2023, 06:26:39 PMMy only advice for the io right now is for him to take things easy with trading because just as you earn profits in trading, you will also record losses too, so you have to trade with only an amount you can bear with if you lose them.I bet @OP knows what to do since he is in the profit in his sessions and he knows he has still a lot to learn.  He might be a newbie account here but we cannot based his trading knowledge on his rank here in the forum.

comments.author: Tuturtinular
comments.body: Quote from: Mst.Wangdan$ on September 25, 2023, 05:58:01 PM~snip~Is this a true story or a lie? Can you explain how your trades are executed? In the last two fingers I haven't seen any significant bitcoin price movements, they tend to be stable, but why do you make so much profit from trading?Gambling? I don't know why you linked trading and gambling in your second paragraph. Yes, we all know that being a gambling addict is a dangerous thing and it is difficult to stop gambling if we are already addicted to gambling. Are you encouraging people to stop gambling and start trading?

comments.author: blue Snow
comments.body: Quote from: Mst.Wangdan$ on September 25, 2023, 05:58:01 PMTwo days ago today I had $100 I traded $100 in bitcoin and made $10 profit now I traded $110 in bitcoin now I have $180 I mean I made $70 in two days Best earnings of my life And I want to make bigger profits trading bitcoin in the future and I want to light my future by trading bitcoin and I will trade and I will not train too much by greed I will not be addicted to training I will always watch the market and invest on bitcoin will try it looks great to me i started with $100 now i have bitcoins $180 i earned $80  between the two it is never possible by any job and it is not possible by any government government what is possible with bitcoin i am bitcoin Much respect and salute. I have seen here many people comparing gambling game with bitcoin gambling game is a test of luck a game should never be compared to it and if you have experience on gambling then you can play gambling but you can't get addicted and get addicted to anything. It is neither good nor harmful for a person. You just have luck, and I hope you don't get carried away with what you get. If I were you I would learn much more about trading and not be complacent like today. I don't know what your method is. you have to develop it to get more profit from today. So when we talk about gambling and compare it with trading, of course, that's something different in what people think.  there is a big difference between, where one of them is playing about luck,

comments.author: ajiz138
comments.body: Quote from: Tuturtinular on September 25, 2023, 10:50:35 PMIs this a true story or a lie? Can you explain how your trades are executed? In the last two fingers I haven't seen any significant bitcoin price movements, they tend to be stable, but why do you make so much profit from trading?I wanted to say that but seeing your post was the same as my thoughts.Don't know if OP trades in spot or futures? From spot trading, it seems impossible to get a profit of $80 in two days, while Bitcoin doesn't have any significant movement and even tends to continue to fall. Quote from: Tuturtinular on September 25, 2023, 10:50:35 PMGambling? I don't know why you linked trading and gambling in your second paragraph. Yes, we all know that being a gambling addict is a dangerous thing and it is difficult to stop gambling if we are already addicted to gambling. Are you encouraging people to stop gambling and start trading?There is no difference in this thread comparing Bitcoin to gambling: Bitcoin is lifeIf he encourages people to trade that's great, but is it that easy to trade? I know the risks are greater in gambling, but trading also has high risks because it could be that you take the wrong position when trading.

comments.author: BlackBoss_
comments.body: Quote from: Mst.Wangdan$ on September 25, 2023, 05:58:01 PMTwo days ago today I had $100 I traded $100 in bitcoin and made $10 profit now I traded $110 in bitcoin now I have $180 I mean I made $70 in two days Best earnings of my lifeIt means you got 80% profit from your initial capital within only two days. Congratulations first but more difficulty starts from here.QuoteAnd I want to make bigger profits trading bitcoin in the futureAfter you got profit, you need to know when to stop because your profitable trading streak can stop anytime. If you think you will continue to get profit, forever and continuously, you will lose your capital and previous profit soon.When your capital becomes bigger, you will have more pressure and can make more emotional trading decisions that are possibly start of your failure.

comments.author: Out of mind
comments.body: Quote from: Mst.Wangdan$ on September 25, 2023, 05:58:01 PM✂️It's great that you've been able to profit from trading, which is what attracted you to Bitcoin. But you must accept some risk before you start trading, since you can earn $80 in two days trading, which can make you greedy later on. Of course, it is very pleasant for you as the best earnings of your life, but you must be careful that you can lose your money if you trade again without understanding. But you said, maybe even a government employee can't earn this much as you have earned by trading for two days. But you have to note that trading is basically risky and most likely to lose money, if you seriously understand the market first. Of course, if you can visit the market well, you will definitely be able to make more profit, and you will be successful in the future, so you should know everything well in advance. If you start trading in Bitcoin you must have an understanding of market volatility, you need to gain enough knowledge about when trading will be profitable so that you never face losses.

comments.author: bitcrystal
comments.body: trading is not that easy, you have done a great job.  i just want to say you should not get too excited. please master your strategy, you still have a lot of things to learn and also prepare for days of losses. you might feel like you will continue winning your trades but i can tell you it might not happen like that which is why as a beginner you should put it at the back of your mind to always avoid over trading. i hope you continue to win more trades.
